summary.span: 用來描述三維物件大小的資料結構。

span.span: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和不通常會以 XAML，因為沒有可設定的屬性存在於使用這些類型的 WPF 3D 物件模型。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 此範例示範如何判斷兩個結構是設定使用的相等靜態方法。This example shows how to determine if two structures are equal using the static method. 下列程式碼說明如何檢查結構是否相等。The following code illustrates how to check structures for equality. 結構宣告和指派的值。The structures are declared and assigned values. 方法可用來判斷兩個結構是否相等。The method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Size3DEqualityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#size3dequalityexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和值必須是非負數。The , , and values must be non-negative. 和不通常會以 XAML，因為沒有可設定的屬性存在於使用這些類型的 WPF 3D 物件模型。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何檢查兩個結構是否相等。The following example shows how to check if two structures are equal. 它也會示範如何將值指派給結構時所宣告的結構，以及之後已宣告的結構。It also shows how to assign values to a structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
